medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient initially diagnosed with prostate cancer in 1998 underwent radical prostatectomy and subsequent hormone therapy. He experienced local recurrence treated with external beam therapy. No significant respiratory symptoms were noted except for exertional dyspnea.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient had a thyroidectomy for thyroid cancer performed in 2001, with no other significant medical history.
medical_history.social_history: The patient lived in Southeast Asia for 10 years and is an ex-smoker.
